* A launcher class to workaround classpath issues.
* Creates two dialog boxes, one echoing user input and the other containing Duke's reply and then appends them to
* the dialog container. Clears the user input after processing.
* The main entry point of the Chatty application.

*

{@code Chatty} coordinates user input, command parsing, task management,
* storage operations, and user interface output. It runs an input-processing
* loop until the user exits the application.
* Represents all supported commands in the Chatty application.

*

{@code COMMAND_UNKNOWN} is used as a fallback for invalid commands.

throw new ChattyExceptions(String.format("Please type a command!%n"));

public static void emptyDescription(String command) throws ChattyExceptions {
throw new ChattyExceptions(String.format("Oops! The description after a " + command + " cannot be empty.%n"));
public static void invalidDeadlineFormat() throws ChattyExceptions {
throw new ChattyExceptions(String.format("Invalid format. Use: deadline <description> /by <date>%n"));

public static void emptyEventFields() throws ChattyExceptions {

* Manages a collection of {@code Task} objects.

*

The {@code TaskList} class provides methods to add, remove,
* retrieve, search, mark, and filter tasks. It also supports
* writing tasks to a file and retrieving tasks due on a specific date.

*

This class acts as the main container for all tasks in the Chatty application.

* @throws AssertionError If the index is out of bounds.
